gw.bizrules.pcf

Class RuleListPageHelper<R extends Rule>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.bizrules.pcf.RuleListPageHelper<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the Rule subtype for which whose list page this is a helper.

    public class RuleListPageHelper<R extends Rule>
extends java.lang.Object
    Supports a page listing Rules or RuleVersions for management purposes such as deployment, export, or cloning. The page may use a query based on a specific R subtype if it needs to support sorting of query results based on specific subtype attributes. In that case, use getRuleQueryResults(Query) to access and cache the query results.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RuleListPageHelper.IteratorCheckedValuesRuleVersionAccessor
      Defines a checked (selected) values accessor for a row iterator based on either a specific Rule subtype or the RuleVersion of a Rule.
      static class  RuleListPageHelper.RuleQueryResults<R extends Rule>
      Defines a IQueryBeanResult on the R subtype that wraps the base result for a query on R and caches the associated RuleVersion and Status.

      • getStatusText

        public static java.lang.String getStatusText(RuleVersion version)
        Returns the deployed status string when deployment is enabled and there is a deployment tag for the local system associated with the rule version or when deployment is disabled and there are any deployment tags associated with the rule version.
        Parameters:
        version - Rule version for which status is requested
        Returns:
        "Deployed" if the rule is approved and deployed, otherwise returns the display name of the rule version's current status

      • getVersionText

        public static java.lang.String getVersionText(RuleVersion version)

      • toggleEnableDisableSelectedRules

        public void toggleEnableDisableSelectedRules(BizRulesPageNavigationSupport navigationSupport,
                                             java.util.Map<RuleActionKey,CommandDefinitionUIConfig> uiConfigs,
                                             Location location,
                                             java.util.List<RuleVersion> versions,
                                             boolean enable)
        Enable or disable multiple selected rules at once. If the rules need to be enabled and selection contains both disabled and already enabled rules, it will only enable the disabled rules and put them into the draft state. Already enabled rules will remain untouched. Similar action happens when the rules need to be disabled.
        Parameters:
        navigationSupport - abstraction around UI of Business Rules
        uiConfigs - configuration to drive display of RuleCommandDefinitions and RuleCommandParameters
        location - Location of the page
        versions - List of rule versions selected
        enable - a flag to identify if the selected rules need to be enabled or disabled. true values mean enable the rules and false value means disable the rules

      • getConfirmationMessageToEnableDisableMultipleRules

        public java.lang.String getConfirmationMessageToEnableDisableMultipleRules(boolean enable)
        Returns the confirmation text message before enabling or disabling multiple selected rules.
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable the rules and false to disable the rules
        Returns:
        the confirmation text message

      • getRuleQueryResults

        public final RuleListPageHelper.RuleQueryResults<R> getRuleQueryResults(Query<R> ruleQuery)
        Resets and caches the RuleListPageHelper.RuleQueryResults for the page based on the specified R query. Used when sorting on specific R subtype attributes is required, but access to the associated RuleVersions is also required.
        Parameters:
        ruleQuery - a RuleQueryFactory.createRuleQueryFactory
        Returns:
        The RuleListPageHelper.RuleQueryResults for the ruleQuery.

      • getRuleQueryResults

        public final RuleListPageHelper.RuleQueryResults<R> getRuleQueryResults()
        Returns:
        The current RuleListPageHelper.RuleQueryResults for the page as specified through #getRuleQueryResults(Query getRuleQueryResults(Query).

      • getCheckedValuesRuleVersionsAccessor

        public final RuleListPageHelper.IteratorCheckedValuesRuleVersionAccessor getCheckedValuesRuleVersionsAccessor(Location location,
                                                                                                              java.lang.String rowIteratorName)
        Creates an accessor for the RuleVersions of the selected R Rules being listed in the named row iterator. The row iterator lists either RuleVersions or R type.
        Parameters:
        location - the PCF location
        rowIteratorName - the name of the row iterator widget that lists the rules either by version or rule
        Returns:
        The row iterator checked values RuleVersion accessor.
